short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows links to some good Website-Analysis-Tools for the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows links to some good Website-Analysis-Tools for the current tab.

Here is the github-repo if you want to contribute: https://github.com/voku/Web-Analyse-Tools-for-Chrome

Happy Coding! :)
